text: Egha gɨn Atrivim Rehoboam Adoniram amadazɨma, a Israelia bagha zui. Adoniram, a fomɨra gumazir atrivimɨn ingangaribagh amir gumazibar garir gumazim. An ziar igharazim Adoram. Dughiar Adoniram ghua Israelia batozimɨn, me bar moghɨra dagɨabar a ginivizɨma an areme. Ezɨ Rehoboam bizir kamɨn akam baregha, zuamɨra uan karisɨn ghuavanabogha ara Jerusalemɨn ghu.
